channel.title: X11 on Gaowan Liang's Blog

item.title: Temporarily Using GUI-Dependent Software on a Headless Server
item.description: I’m running a Minecraft server that was recently updated to the latest version. To prepare for generating new biomes, I need to clear some unused chunks, which requires MCA Selector - a software that needs a GUI environment. The map files are quite large (over 1GB), so downloading them, editing locally, and re-uploading would be too cumbersome. I needed to find a way to use this software directly on the server.
